title: Crow boy
creator_credit: Weston Woods Studios and Cynthia Freitag
brief_description: A shy boy attending a village school in Japan withdraws into a world of his own until a kind and wise teacher draws him out and his classmates discover his special talent. Based on the book of the same title by Taro Yashima.
